name: Free Sample
pages: The "Free Sample" rule allows you to give customers a limited number of Free trade interactions before the normally defined price is utilized.

pages.text: The rule has very basic inputs, most of which should be straightforward. The text box at the top-left allows you to define how many free samples they can claim before the rule ignores them.

pages: The Time Input at the bottom allows you to tell the rule to forget about previous interactions so that players may claim a new free sample every so often.$(br2)There is also a Reset button in the middle that clears the rules memory, allowing players who have already claimed their free sample to claim them once again.
